Name: Pincer Attack
Description: Discard your left- and rightmost cards. NL Deal !D! damage for each [E]  or [coinforged:returnIcon]  in the cost of the discarded cards.

Name: Re-Roll
Description: Once per turn, whenever you play all six dice values, take an extra turn after this one.

Name: Lucky Seven
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL If this is the 7th card you've played this turn, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

Name: Lay Low
Description: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard 1 card. NL Draw !M! cards.

Name: Roll Blue
Description: Roll !M! coinforged:Blue_Die.

Name: Hold Out
Description: Retain. NL Draw !M! Cards. NL Gain [E] [E] [E] [E] .

Name: Restoring Force
Description: Gain !B! Block twice. NL coinforged:Overflow: Increase your max hand size by !M!.

Name: Lucky Nine
Description: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. If this is the 9th card you've played this turn, gain 9 Strength. NL Exhaust.

Name: Blazing Tactics
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw !M! card and set its cost to 1 this turn.

Name: Pocket Pair
Description: Roll !M! coinforged:Green_Dice. NL Exhaust.

Name: Cheater's Luck
Description: Duplicate a random card in your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Name: Collector's Blade
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy has coinforged:Crippling_Debt, they lose !M! Strength.

Name: Dive
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, draw !M! additional card.

Name: Overflowing Armor
Description: Your cards have coinforged:Overflow: Gain !M! Block.

Name: Go For Broke
Description: Whenever you play a card, apply !M! coinforged:Crippling_Debt to a random enemy and increase this by 1. Resets each turn.

Name: Stacked Deck
Description: Scry !M!. NL Exhaust.

Name: Underdog
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL  If your HP is lower than the enemy's, this deals double damage.

Name: Loaded Dice
Description: Increase *Dice effectiveness by !M!.

Name: Melon
Description: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, draw a card.

Name: Trickster's Mark
Description: Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable to a random enemy.

Name: Upswing
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL Roll !M! coinforged:Blue_Die.

Name: Down Payment
Description: Innate. NL Apply !coinforged:debt! coinforged:Crippling_Debt. NL Exhaust.

Name: Attack
Description: Put a random Attack from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

Name: High Roller
Description: Whenever you play a *Six, draw a card.

Name: Grapes
Description: Ethereal. NL Increase a card's Block and damage by !M! this combat. Add a copy of this card into your hand that costs 1 more. NL Exhaust.

Name: Card Cascade
Description: Whenever you draw a card this turn, deal !M! damage to a random enemy. NL Draw a card.

Name: Roll Red
Description: Roll !M! coinforged:Red_Dice.

Name: Cash Advance
Description: Draw !M! Cards. NL Draw 1 less card next turn.

Name: Lucky Eight
Description: Gain !B! Block. NL If this is the 8th card you've played this turn, gain 8 Thorns.

Name: Unleashed Strategy
Description: Increase your max hand size by !M!. Draw !M! cards. Gain [E]  for every 3 cards in hand. NL Exhaust.

Name: Invigorating Riffle
Description: Whenever a Skill is Exhausted, gain !M! Vigor.

Name: Controlled Chaos
Description: Draw !M! cards. NL Reduce your max hand size by 2.

Name: Bank Error
Description: Deal !M! damage. NL Apply !coinforged:debt! coinforged:Crippling_Debt.

Name: Fate's Hand
Description: Draw 3 cards, then discard 2. NL If the discarded cards had the same cost, gain !M! Strength.

Name: Chaos Form
Description: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, roll a *Chaos *Die.

Name: Golden Gamble
Description: Lose 10 Gold. NL If you win next turn, gain !M! Gold. NL Exhaust.

Name: Defend
Description: Gain !B! Block.

Name: Discipline
Description: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Set your max hand size to 4.

Name: Red King
Description: coinforged:Red_Dice now damage ALL enemies. NL Roll !M! coinforged:Red_Dice.

Name: Lucky Break
Description: Draw 2 Cards. NL If they have the same cost, gain !M! Dexterity.

Name: Coin Barrage
Description: Deal !D! damage 11 times. NL Reduce your max hand size by !M!.

Name: Snake Eyes
Description: Ethereal. NL The next 2 times you roll *Dice you will always roll a one. NL Gain 1 *Buffer.

Name: Red Rage
Description: Roll !coinforged:rolls! coinforged:Red_Dice.

Name: Floodgate
Description: Whenever your hand becomes full, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Name: Slot Machine Learning
Description: At the start of your turn, draw 1 additional card. If you don't, gain !M! Strength.

Name: Long Game
Description: Doesn't shuffle into your deck at the start of combat. Added into hand on turn !M!. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. Gain 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.

Name: Luck of the Draw
Description: Whenever you draw a card, you have a 25% chance to gain !M! Block.

Name: Fold
Description: Gain !M! Block for each card played this turn. NL End your turn.

Name: Wave of Greed
Description: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! gold for each enemy hit. NL Exhaust.

Name: Grow
Description: Gain !M! Strength. NL Shuffle a copy of this into your draw pile that costs 1 more.

Name: Power
Description: Put a random Power from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

Name: Cripple
Description: Apply !coinforged:debt! coinforged:Crippling_Debt to ALL enemies.

Name: Prismatic Roll
Description: Roll !M! coinforged:Red_Die. NL Roll !M! coinforged:Blue_Die. NL Roll !M! coinforged:Green_Die. NL Roll !M! coinforged:Purple_Die. NL Exhaust.

Name: Anticipate
Description: Roll !M! coinforged:Purple_Die. NL Retain your hand this turn.

Name: Swift Guard
Description: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce your max hand size by !M!.

Name: Small Blind
Description: Gain !B! Block. NL Lose !M! Gold.

Name: Double-Dealing
Description: Choose 2 cards. NL Swap their cost this combat. NL Exhaust.

Name: Bluff
Description: Deal !D! damage. If you have any debuffs, gain !B! Block.

Name: Shifty Strike
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card. NL coinforged:Overflow: Apply !M! Vulnerable.

Name: Drunken Strike
Description: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy. NL Whenever you draw this, randomize its cost.

Name: Chipped Blade
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals 1 less damage for each card in your discard pile.

Name: Skill
Description: Put a random Skill from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

Name: Heart Of The Cards
Description: Draw X cards and set their cost to 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Name: Unflex
Description: EVERYONE loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaustive !stslib:ex!.

Name: Indebt
Description: Apply !coinforged:debt! coinforged:Crippling_Debt. NL Apply !M! Weak.

Name: Joker Trick
Description: Choose a card type. NL Put a random card of that type from your draw pile into your hand. NL It costs !M! less this turn. NL Exhaust

Name: Glass Shard
Description: Retain. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

Name: Hit and Run
Description: Ethereal. NL Your Attacks deal 75% more damage. Whenever you play an Attack, Exhaust it.

Name: Twin Slash
Description: Deal !D! damage twice. coinforged:Overflow: draw 1 card.

Name: Strike
Description: Deal !D! damage.

Name: Recession
Description: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain !coinforged:playerWeak! Weak.

Name: Coin Flick
Description: Deal !D! damage. NL Whenever you play a 2+ cost card, add this from the draw pile to your hand and increase its damage by !M!.

Name: Reevaluate
Description: Discard a card. Gain Block equal to its damage. NL Exhaust.

Name: Card Shark
Description: Deal !D! damage. If this is the leftmost card in your hand, it costs 0.

Name: Broken Bottle
Description: Deal !D! damage X times. NL Add a *Glass *Shard into your hand.
